description: [``botocore``] Added support for tags on restore.

[``botocore``] Amazon Pinpoint is deprecating the tags parameter in the UpdateSegment, UpdateCampaign, UpdateEmailTemplate, UpdateSmsTemplate, UpdatePushTemplate, UpdateInAppTemplate and UpdateVoiceTemplate. Amazon Pinpoint will end support tags parameter by May 22, 2023.
[``botocore``] Add support for Asset Bundle, Geospatial Heatmaps.
